sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Plastic Bulk Merchandise Container Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Plastic Bulk Merchandise Container Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Requirements applicable to the sale of plastic bulk merchandise containers.
sections.text: Requirements applicable to the sale of plastic bulk merchandise containers.

sections.heading: Records. A person shall retain a record obtained or made under this Act until the first anniversary of the later of the date the containers are purchased or delivered
sections.text: Records. A person shall retain a record obtained or made under this Act until the first anniversary of the later of the date the containers are purchased or delivered.

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act does not apply to the collection, receipt, or recycling of plastic bulk merchandise containers by a licensed waste hauler.
sections.text: Applicability. This Act does not apply to the collection, receipt, or recycling of plastic bulk merchandise containers by a licensed waste hauler.
